newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - June 9.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - June 9.

text.p: Following are some of the leading stories in the Japanese press on Monday, as reported by Kyodo news agency:
-- Japan and United States announce interim report on reviewing defense cooperation guidelines.
-- Managing director Sugita and senior managing director Kaneko seen as candidates for Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank Ltd (DKB) president.
-- Major trading houses to resume large-scale projects in Russia.
-- All eight DKB directors with rights to represent DKB to resign.
-- Tokyo prosecutors to investigate DKB executives in charge of screening loans.
